description:

Experience the captivating allure of Oud Azrak EDP, a luxurious oud fragrance that embodies the rich heritage of Arabian perfumery. This exquisite 100ML eau de parfum creates an unforgettable olfactory journey through the mystical landscapes of the Middle East. âœ¨

The Oud Azrak journey begins with a vibrant burst of bergamot, delicately balanced with the exotic warmth of saffron and the floral elegance of rose. As the fragrance evolves, the heart reveals the star ingredient â€“ precious oud â€“ accompanied by rich ambergris and earthy patchouli. The base notes of vanilla, musk, sandalwood, and amber create a lasting impression of opulence and sophistication.

The Legacy of Oud Azrak

Drawing inspiration from ancient Arabian perfumery traditions, Oud Azrak represents the pinnacle of olfactory artistry. Each bottle encapsulates centuries of perfume-making expertise, with premium oud as its centerpiece â€“ a resinous heartwood that has been treasured across the Middle East for generations. This exceptional fragrance stands as a testament to the timeless appeal of Arabian oud.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Oud Azrak EDP last on skin?

Oud Azrak EDP is formulated with high-concentration premium oud and fixative base notes, allowing it to last 8-12 hours on most skin types. The fragrance develops beautifully throughout the day, with the rich oud and amber notes becoming more pronounced over time. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on well-moisturized skin. âœ¨
